Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh got the first breakthrough by dismissing Litton Das
Towhid Hridoy was dropped by Nitish Kumar Reddy, but later took a six off Varun Chakaravarthy
Najmul Hossain Shanto reverse swept a six off Varun Chakaravarthy
Mayank Yadav took his first T20I wicket by dismissing Mahmudullah
Varun Chakaravarthy took three wickets in the match
Hardik Pandya finished off the game with 39 off 16 balls
Arshdeep Singh took two wickets in the first over and was awarded the player of the match
Pre-Game Insights: Najmul Hossain Shanto, the captain of Bangladesh said it is a pretty new side and a couple of new guys are coming in as well
Suryakumar Yadav, the captain of India said that it is a bit humid and does not think it will change much during the game
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav said they just tried to back their skills and tried to walk the talk
Najmul Hossain Shanto said they did not start well and needed to focus on strike rotation and not only on hitting boundaries
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Gwalior and the crowd was in full attendance
India won the match by 7 wickets and took a 1-0 lead in the series
